original_text: Josiah celebrated the Passover to the Lord in Jerusalem, and the Passover lamb was slaughtered on the fourteenth day of the first month.
korean_text: 요시야가 예루살렘에서 여호와께 유월절을 지켜 첫째 달 열넷째 날에 유월절 어린 양을 잡으니라

sentences.original_text: Josiah celebrated the Passover to the Lord
and the Passover lamb was slaughtered
on the fourteenth day of the first month
